item.title: Building a Who's that Pokémon game for Android with .NET MAUI and Blazor Hybrid
item.description: Blazor was initially developed to build interactive web applications using C#, but can now be used in many platforms when used together with .NET MAUI. In this post, I’ll show how to use Blazor Hybrid to develop a Who’s that Pokémon game for Android.
item.postDescription: Blazor was initially developed to build interactive web applications using C#, but can now be used in many platforms when used together with .NET MAUI. In this post, I’ll show how to use Blazor Hybrid to develop a Who’s that Pokémon game for Android.
